title: Love Island's Maura Higgins and Curtis Pritchard officially a couple
text:
Congrats Maura and Curtis – we’d never have guessed! (Pictures: Rex)

Fans have long suspected it – and now, Love Island stars Maura Higgins and Curtis Pritchard have confirmed they are a couple!

Revealing all in a photoshoot and magazine interview about how they made their relationship official, Maura said: ‘He asked and I said yes, obviously.’

We didn’t see this one coming. Not!

The pair of course both shot to fame on this year’s series of the ITV reality show, with professional dancer Curtis having previously appeared on Dancing With the Stars.

They’ve since been a regular fixtures on each other’s social media accounts, as well as at showbiz events, such as the recent Animal Hero Awards.

Talking about how their things between the pair started to become serious, Maura furthermore said: ‘He took me away for a weekend break, and he asked me out over dinner in London the next day.’

Curtis and Maura were two of the most popular people on this year’s Love Island (Picture: PA)

Curtis, 23, meanwhile told OK! Magazine: ‘I want something that’s going to last forever. There’s no point rushing [anything]. We’ve only known each other a short amount of time.’

Since leaving the villa, Maura, 28, has signed a deal with Ann Summers and signed up for work with This Morning and the 2020 series of Dancing on Ice.

She’ll be a contestant on next year’s series, alongside comic Michael Barrymore and Steps’ Ian ‘H’ Watkins.

The two had a well-deserved holiday recently (Picture: Instagram)

The star also spoke in the interview about training for the show, admitting it’s ‘tougher’ than expected because ‘I keep falling over because I have no balance!’

Not to worry Maura, you have plenty of time to practise. And Curtis can help!
